My DIL goes into work at her LTC home. To body bags. This is absolutely brutal. These workers are breaking. They can't say a proper goodbye, and they can't even do their honour guard: a respectful line as someone leaves them for the last time. This was preventable, @fordnation

My older sister passed away yesterday after a very brief illness. She was only 45, but spent the last 15 years of her life living in LTC due to her disabilities. She faced many challenges in life, but she was cheerful and loving & embraced her role as big sister with relish.
The LTC situation needs to be fixed.
